answers.answer: I have gestational diabetes I'm now 35 wks first they had me try to control it w diet but I couldn't they added metformin 500 didn't cut it they upped it to 850 and it still wasn't enough so I was just recently put on insulin . My Dr told me it can get worse and harder to keep under control the farther u get which for me is true my fasting numbers r always high :( I get a non stress test weekly and an ultra sound to check his size he is currently measuring 6 days ahead :/ which Dr said is normal if numbers rnt kept under control I even stick to a strict diet my dietician gave me :( hopefully u u have it this won't be ur issue and u can control it w diet .. my Dr will also be inducing me at 38 or 39 weeks .. good luck momma
I just failed my 1 hour test too and have to take my 3 hour on monday. I had a 165. This is my third pregnancy and I didn't have this with my other 2 so I am worrying a little about the outcome.
I failed mine idk my # but today meeting with dietician  I'm 9 wks

question: Took my glucose test a week ago and failed it with a 161 result. Taking the three hour test right now. Not fun at all! Any moms ir soon to be moms fail this test? I want to know what do expect if I do!
title: failed my glucose test
